item.description:
When:             Saturday, January 28, from 9 am to 5pm

Where:            The Theosophical Society in Boston

21 Maple Street

Arlington, MA 02476

Fee:                $100 prepaid / $120 at the door

                       (Partial scholarships available - No one turned away)

Contact Kevin Martin @ 978-494-4542 / kenda_assoc@msn.comor contact Barry Harris @ 857-600-5247 / barrymh2002@yahoo.com for further details about scholarships.

In this powerful one day seminar you will learn some of the exciting things that quantum physics tells us about life, health, and spirituality.

You will come to understand what is real and what illusionary in your life.  You will also learn concepts and techniques about how to start taking control of your life.

This unique program combines concepts of Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP), Ho’oponopono (Hawaiian process of forgiveness and grace) and the latest discoveries in quantum physics.

In this seminar you will learn:

·        The truth about Mysticism

·         How we create our own experience

·        How our actions affect others and the world we perceive

·         How to change/control your mindset, attitude, and your state of mind

·         How we perceive the world – What reality is really?

·         How to ‘clear’ the illusions we have of the world

o   Negative Emotions

o   Judgments

·         How to see your limitations and ‘blow them away’

·        How to create miracles in your own life

·         How forgiveness plays a vital role in your own well being

·         You will discover how to find abundance in many areas of your live

o  Health

o   Happiness

o   Love

o   Success

·         To bring a new awareness into your life that will stay with you forever

 

“A man sooner or later discovers that he is the master-gardener of his soul, the director of his life.”

James Allen

 

In this seminar, you will not just hear the information, you will experience the techniques offered to help you create your own reality – your own miracles.  You will leave this seminar empowered to mold your life into what you want, to create miracles for yourself.

 

Kevin Martin is an author (Perceive This! How to Get Everything You Want Out of Life By Changing Your Perceptions), professional speaker, and hypnotherapist.  He has been practicing NLP for over 15 years.  He is a master practitioner of NLP and a hypnotherapist.  Kevin has a passion for understanding how the mind, body, and spirit work together.

For many years Kevin has been helping others attain what they want in life.  He has been researching ways in which people can find happiness and success in their lives for many years.

Barry Harris worked at the Hippocrates Institute in Boston, writing health booklets for Dr. Ann Wigmore, discoverer of wheatgrass and founder of the live food movement. Hippocrates Institute is a unique healing center with a powerful spiritual focus, and an extreme dietary regime which often attracted clients who Western medicine had labeled terminally ill.  While there Barry witnessed many miraculous recoveries.  Later Barry witnessed more miracles while working for four years in various centers around the U.S. founded by Viktoras Kulvinskas, Dr. Wigmore's Director.

 

Being obsessed with the secret to miracles, Barry performed 20 years of independent research connecting quantum physics to Energy Medicine, cellular biology, mind/body medicine, effect of emotions on health,  etc.

 

Barry's research has been the source for the course "Beggars At God's Banquet: Miracles Are Our Birthright" which he has been presenting for the past five years.   After presenting much of the latest scientific evidence supporting spirit as prime in the universe, and thus predicting miracles, Barry's course focuses on the paradox that if miracles are so easily predicted by the latest science, why are miracles so rare.  In other words, what makes Barry's work, unique, is that he looks at the mind tricks that the ego plays to disempower us and prevent miracles, and what can be done to get in a state of grace and empowerment, beyond the ego's tricks.  Barry's book"Beggars At God's Banquet" based on the contents of the course will be published by X-Libris Publishing in the spring.

 

Barry is also a singer/voice teacher who teaches "Voice As a Path of Spiritual and Emotional Healing”. His voice students learn the relationship of ego to breath patterns, and how this relates to surrender to a higher power.  Barry is qualified to teach about miracles, because he had his own miracle.  He restored his singing voice, by recognizing the need for spiritual grace, and surrender of control to a higher power, after Western doctors said he had damaged his voice beyond repair.

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Breaking Through the Illusions and Create Your Own Miracles
